rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, E3008, P2001, P3002})
Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469}

description: This unit provides students with an introduction to the fundamentals of organic chemistry, inorganic chemistry and the chemistry of biomolecules, with an emphasis on those aspects that are relevant to understanding the design and mechanism of action of therapeutic agents.Topics include: amines aldehydes and ketones carboxylic acids and functional derivatives lipids organic polymer chemistry carbohydrates amino acids and proteins nucleic acids perspectives in medicinal chemistry coordination compounds
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
